Home.title: IIIF 3D Viewer
Home.subtitle: A viewer application that provides 3D model display and annotation functionality based on IIIF Manifest.
Home.feature1Description: Interactive display of 3D models in GLB format. Freely rotate and zoom with mouse or touch controls.
Home.feature2Description: Add annotations to specific positions on 3D models. Manage detailed information and comments in association.
Home.feature3Description: Compliant with IIIF Manifest format. Share and display digital content in a standardized way.
Home.step1: 1. Enter the URL of an IIIF Manifest in the form below.
Home.step2: 2. Click the "Open Viewer" button to display the 3D model.
Home.step3: 3. Rotate and zoom the model with mouse or touch controls to examine details.
Home.step4: 4. If annotations are present, they will be displayed on the model and can be clicked for details.
